website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a bead maze of epic proportions, this one won't disappoint. Quality and size is on par with those found in daycares and doctor's offices.
pros: Large enough for multiple children to play with at once
An interesting variety of curves and spirals keeps kids of different age groups intrigued
Durable and crafted from child-safe materials
Excellent quality from a trusted brand
cons: Takes up a large chunk of floorspace

customer_reviews.title: BEST BEAD MAZE out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bead maze I have seen. It keeps my tot busy for a good 20 mins plus. We can also do it together. I wanted a macdaddy one and not the little ones you see normally. My doc's office has a huge, vintage one made entirely of wood, and this was the closest I could find. If you can afford it, this is a great item to have. I could see putting it in my bathroom and my taking a quick shower while my tot busies himself wi/ this. And sometimes, it can get to that stage!
customer_reviews.author: Bookaholic

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality product
customer_reviews.text: My son has autism and is very selective of which toys he favors to play with. This is by far his favorite toy! He plays roughly, and this product is very durable. I highly recommend this wooden bead maze.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Pilcher

customer_reviews.title: bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. My kids from infant age all the way through kindergarten have fun with this toy. It’s well made and looks lovely in the playroom. It’s much bigger than I thought it would be. A crawling baby and crawl through the middle of the tunnel. This means two kids can sit and play on each side of it and there’s plenty to keep a younger toddler occupied for quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for my 2 and 4 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this. My 2 year old plays with it everyday. It’s the perfect size for 2 kids to play with at the same time. Our kitten even joins in on the fun sometimes. I wish it hadn’t been so pricey but the quality is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great toy! Awesome value
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! Awesome value! This is the best wooden bead toy I could find anywhere for this price, and a great size! It’s nice an big, whereas most others out there are much smaller. My 2 year old loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for the long winter evenings plus we cal all ...
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but soon worth it!! great for the long winter evenings plus we cal all 3 play with it. You want to have a decent size room though...seriously! lol
customer_reviews.author: Samy's mom

customer_reviews.title: Toy
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves it. He is autistic so the required Coordination is good for him.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: easy to move
customer_reviews.text: lightweight, easy to move, looks great in the toy room, high quality. my toddler and my baby equally are mesmerized by it. we have a lot of hape toys and the quality is always top notch. love love.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a great toy, well made but price too high fir what it is.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful "toy" for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful "toy" for toddlers! This was a huge hit with my grandson, and all of his birthday guests! Good concentration, counting and color skills if you wish to explore them with your toddler! A winner!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing my babies love it!!! No flaws and more than enough space for play for 2 boys
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Help!
customer_reviews.text: I really want to get this for my one year old grandson, but it says in red letters “ small parts not for age less than three” can anyone help explain this???
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Koch

product_meta.title: Hape Tunnel Mountain Wooden Toddler Bead Maze
product_meta.description:
Tunnel Mountain maze by Hape. Squiggle, swoosh, shimmy, and slide. Race round and round the mountain with this endless maze. Beads move along the wire around the mountain peaks and through tunnels. Allows children to develop hand eye coordination and color recognition, having fun working with others or by themselves. Perfect for home, waiting room, or daycare environments. Durable child safe paint finish and solid wood construction are hallmarks of Hape toys. Hape's toys stimulate children through every stage of development and help nurture and develop their natural abilities. All Hape products sold in North America meet or exceed all applicable safety standards. Tunnel Mountain maze by Hape. Squiggle, swoosh, shimmy, and slide.
